ARABIC: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: How evil is the metaphor of those who deny Our Signs. It is themselves that they have badly wronged.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Evil is the case of those who deny Our signs and wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Evil is the example of the people who reject Our signs as false and perpetrate wrong against their own selves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: How terrible is the example of those who have rejected Our revelations and have done injustice only to themselves!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What an evil example is of those who denied Our signs and used to wrong only their own souls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Evil is the parable of the people who rejected Our Ayat, and used to wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Evil is the likeness of the people who reject Our communications and are unjust to their own souls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: An evil likeness is the likeness of the people who cried lies to Our signs, and themselves were wronging.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Evil as an example are the folk who denied Our revelations, and were wont to wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: How evil is the case of those who deny Our signs. They only wrong themselves:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Vile is the likeness of the people who belie Our signs, and their own souls they are wont to wrong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Evil is the parable of the people who deny Our signs and wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Evil as an example are people who reject Our signs and wrong their own souls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Evil is the likeness of the people who reject Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses and signs, etc.), and used to wrong their ownselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Evil is the example of those who belied Our verses; they wronged themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Evil is the metaphor of the people who reject Our signs and wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: How evil an example [is that of] the people who denied Our signs and used to wrong themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:177] Evil as an example are the people, evil is the example of the people, who denied Our signs, and were wont to wrong themselves, through denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Evil as an example are the folk who denied Our revelations) Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, if their example is as that of a dog, (and were wont to wrong themselves) to harm themselves by being tortured.
